meanings.sent1: She wore a slutty dress to the party, with stains all over it.
meanings.sent2: The room looked slutty with clothes scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: Despite her efforts, her room always ended up looking slutty.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a slutty appearance, covered in dust and cobwebs.
meanings.sent5: The muddy dog left slutty paw prints all over the clean floor.

meanings.definition: Promiscuous or sexually provocative in behavior
meanings.sent1: She felt uncomfortable in the slutty outfit she was wearing.
meanings.sent2: The movie portrayed the character as a slutty woman who flirted with everyone.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show made fun of the stereotype of a slutty character.
meanings.sent4: Her friends warned her about the consequences of acting slutty at the party.
meanings.sent5: The novel described the antagonist as a manipulative and slutty individual.
